description: Contains the list of all actions taken during the medication sign off process.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUD_MED_RVWR_ID
columns.description: Contains the ID of the user who took the corresponding action (like signing off on the report) during the medication review process.

columns.name: AUD_MED_RVW_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the action (such as updates sent or sign off received) that took place.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Message Sent


Sign Off Received


Reviewed - Updates Needed


Retracted - Under Review


Sent Updates


No Signoff Needed

columns.name: AUD_ACTION_INS_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the instant when this action occurred during the medication review process.

columns.name: AUD_MED_RVW_DEV_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the device used when the user signed off on the medications.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
